sys_script_include.name: NeedItUtils2

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.NeedItUtils2</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Utils Script Include for the NeedIt application.</description><name>NeedItUtils2</name><script><![CDATA[var NeedItUtils2 = Class.create();
NeedItUtils2.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    isDatePast: function(strDate) {
        // Create GlideDateTime objects for the current date and the passed in date
        var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
        var testdate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);

        // If the testdate is before rightnow, return true, else return false
        if (testdate.before(rightnow)) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    },
	
    type: 'NeedItUtils2'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-15 20:15:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>d112c2ff47431110bcabda97436d43ce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedItUtils2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d112c2ff47431110bcabda97436d43ce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-15 20:28:59</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
